system.description: Common amongst the gem dragons, this umbra shifts with draconic cunning. While this umbra is active you gain an expertise die on Stealth checks, and once on each of your turns you may alter your appearance (as the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.vemj08hawvmf44ya]{disguise self} spell). When your umbra ends, so do any illusions conjured by it.
